com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.viewer
Class TreeViewer

java.lang.Object
  com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.util.Observable
      com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.viewer.Viewer<TreeContentProvider>
          com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.viewer.TreeViewer
All Implemented Interfaces:
BaseTreeViewer, Checkable, SelectionProvider
public class TreeViewer
extends Viewer<TreeContentProvider>
implements Checkable, BaseTreeViewer

An interface to content providers for tree-structure-oriented viewers. Content providers for tree viewers must implement either the ITreeContentProvider interface or the IAsyncTreeContentProvider interface.

See Also:
TreeViewer

setCaching

public void setCaching(boolean caching)
Sets whether the children should be cached after first being retrieved from the content provider. When false, the tree items will be removed when collapsed.Default value is true.

Parameters:
caching -

setChecked

public boolean setChecked(java.lang.Object element,

Description copied from interface: Checkable
Sets the checked state for the given element in this viewer. Does not fire events to check state listeners.

Specified by:
setChecked in interface Checkable
Parameters:
element - the element
state - true if the item should be checked, and false if it should be unchecked
Returns:
